properties.areaDesc: Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 9 at 3:45PM CST until January 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 25 to 30 knots with
gusts up to 35 knots and seas 8 to 11 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 knots with gusts up
to 30 knots and seas 7 to 9 feet.

* WHERE...Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas from 20 to 60
NM and Waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel from
20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 AM CST
Friday. For the Gale Warning, from 9 AM Friday to midnight CST
Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Gale force winds and high seas will result in
dangerous marine conditions which could result in capsized or
damaged vessels.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong offshore flow will develop beyond
this, once a cold front moves through Friday night.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT
